headline: TransDigm Group (TDG): Is the Aerospace Supplier’s Premium Valuation Still Justified After Its Recent Pullback?
summary: Recent performance and investor focus TransDigm Group (TDG) has quietly pulled back over the past week, slipping about 4% and adding to a softer month, even as the stock remains meaningfully higher over the past year and 3 years. See our latest analysis for TransDigm Group. That recent wobble comes after a solid run, with the latest share price at $1294.65 and a modest year to date share price gain. At the same time, a strong multi year total shareholder return hints that long term momentum...
